text: Sudah beberapa kali menginap di Hotel ini semenjak 3 tahun lalu, Saya dari medan, karna jauh jadi setiap stay selalu ambil longstay karena di hotel ini nyaman terutama pelayanannnya. Meski selalu berkunjung di kondisi high okupansi saya tidak pernah kecewa karena pelayanan yang diberikan tetap sama, meski mungkin ada beberapa kendala di kamar bukan menjadi persoalan karena saya paham hotel ramai jadi kendala kecil itu sudah hal yang harus dimaklumi. Sarapan tadi ditemani ibu sasmita dan diajak ngobrol banyak, ada info terbaru juga yang saya ketahui. Hal yang perlu ditingkatkan adalah kecepatan refill barang seperti sendok ataupun piring2 serta makanannya. Itu saja sarannya, semoga semakin baik kedepannya

text: Proses check in dan check out cepat, pelayanan ramah & hangat terutama mbak Vita Resepsionis. Kebersihan kamar dan fasilitas lain cukup bersih. Kita diberi kamar sesuai request yaitu smoking dan nice view ke perkotaan. Hanya saja di kamar mandi tidak ada shower curtain jadi ketika mandi air kemana2 & exhouse juga sempat mati, tp langsung dibetulkan oleh teknisi. Sarapan cukup, mungkin bisa ditingkatkan untuk kualitas rasa dan variasi menu. Lokasi dekat dengan Tugu Jogja, sehingga akses mudah kemana2. Dan bisa kulineran di sekitar area hotel, karena dekat pasar Kranggan juga. So far so good. Terima kasih

text:
Chekin di khas tugu request minta kamar yg smoking room dan dikasih yg lantai 8, kyknya lantai paling atas, pemandangannya keren, liat kota Yogyakarta dr atas... Untuk kamarnya bersih sih, tp luas ruangan gak lebar2 amat.. Fasilitas kamar mandi cukup sih, ya standar gt lah tp gk ada bath up nya, tp mgkn jg beda tipe kamar beda jg fasilitasnya hehe... 
Hotel ini jg dkt dgn tugu Jogja, Malioboro, stasiun Yogyakarta hnya sekitar 1 km aja sih jarak dr hotel ini. Lokasi hotel ini hnya sekitar 700 meter ke arah barat Tugu Yogyakarta.

Utk menu sarapan ada nasi putih atau nasgor dan bbrp tumis sayuran, bakmi goreng, aneka sambal, lauk pauk (ayam,daging), krupuk, buah dan pelengkap lainnya. Utk rasa nilainya 7.5/10 tiap org beda jg tentunya utk penilaian rasa 😂😂😂

Karyawan/stafnya ramah2 juga, baik reseptionisnya, room boy ataupun staf yg lain. Beberapa kali menanyakan informasi jg dibantu dgn sangat baik dan ramah, kl gk salah namanya mas arbi, informasi yg diberikan cukup mudah dipahami dan dimengerti.

Oh iya khas tugu ini ada kolam renang nya juga, tp tdk luas sih hnya kira-kira 20m² luasnya dgn kedalaman 1,2m. intinya hotel ini cocok lah utk para wisatawan, atau hnya staycation dan tentunya hrganya terjangkau sesuai dgn fasilitas yg diberikan.

walaupun demikian demi mengenang cerianya keluarga ku ketika menginap  di pesonna  sembari mengenang momen wisuda dulu , aku seringkali menyempatkan untuk staycation di sini, disaat penat , dan lelah namun semuanya terobati dengan ingat momen wisuda waktu dua tahun lalu 

saya ingat betul dari sebelum lobbynya berubah hingga sekarang di percantik dengan indah 

pelayannya ramah, bahkan saya ga usah ribet buat nunjukin ktp karena saya tercatat sebagai customernya mereka hehe.. mungkin gara2 seringnya saya menginap disini , harga bersahabat dan diam diam resepsionis mengupgrade kamar saya tanpa ada tambahan biaya 

terimakasih pesonna atas pengalamannya

hotel ini punya banyak keunggulan :
1.  terkesan mewah, meski bintang 3, tapi bangunannya terlihat keren.

text: Sangat menyenangkan menginap di Pesonna Hotel Tugu. Lokasi sangat strategis, tamu bisa berjalan santai sampai ke tugu karena lokasinya tidak jauh dengan tugu, dekat dengan beberapa kuliner jogja (gulai pak samin, lupis mbah satinem, angkringan KR, dll). Selain itu, pelayanan bagus, staf ramah & helpful. Protokol kesehatan pun diperhatikan di hotel ini, masuk hotel dilakukan pengecekan suhu, disemprotkan hand sanitizer, bahkan di dekat lift selalu ada mesin hand sanitizer automatic yg bisa digunakan para tamu. Hotel ini juga sering menyediakan welcome drink berupa wedang jahe hangat dan teh hangat. Untuk kamarnya, saya sangat suka karena disediakan alquran, mukena, dan sajadah. Luas kamar pun cukup luas. Kamar juga termasuk bersih & wangi. Wifi kencang. AC tidak trouble. Untuk breakfast, walaupun menunya tidak banyak, tetapi rasanya tidak mengecewakan. Interior restonya lucu sekali, instragammable hehee. Saran, tetap dipertahankan pelayanan dari staf2nya yg ramah dan sigap sekali terhadap keinginan para tamu. Terimakasih, Pesonna Tugu! ❤️
title: Hotel favorit keluarga ❤️

text: Akhirnya setelah sekian lama bisa kembali lagi mengunjungi Yogyakarta dan selalu Pesonna Hotel Tugu Yogyakarta yang menjadi pilihan utama untuk singgah bermalam. Ketika pertama kali memasuki lobby langsung disambut hangat oleh 3 orang petugas yang saat itu sedang bersiaga dibalik meja. "Selamat sore pak agung, sudah lama ndak ke Jogja " sambut Mba Nia dan Mba Nana, saya pun kaget bahkan dalam keadaan memakai masker Mba Nia dan Mba Nana masih mengenali saya hehe, memang kalau dalam hal service dan keramahan petugas, Pesonna Tugu Yogyakarta adalah yang paling ciamik, dibanding dengan beberapa hotel yang sering saya singgahi. Kembali sapaan dan obrolan ringan sembari memenuhi administrasi pemesanan kamar hotel pun terjadi disana. Saya sangat senang bisa kembali menginap disini karna saking seringnya sudah berasa seperti rumah sendiri hehe. Semoga proses pelebaran lobby segera rampung sehingga tempat parkir menjadi lega kembali sehingga pelayanan kembali prima, nyaman mulai dari posisi parkir, penyambutan tamu, dan nyaman pula beristirahat di tempat tidur. Semoga bisa segera lekas kembali ke sini 🙏🙏🙏

text:
Saya menginap tanggal 15 Aug yang kebetulan long weekend. Dan benar saja sore hari kami sampai di hotel parkir sudah lumayan penuh dan ternyta memang occupancy hotel saat itu lumayan tinggi.Kesan pertama ketika check in, staff FO sangat ramah dan informatif(ini yang paling berkesan). Bagian lain yang lebih berkesan adalah menu Bento yang dijual di Resto (Room service) harga nya tidak terlalu mahal hanya 35rb, tapi dapat free wedang Uwuh dan yang biasanya anak saya yang umur 4th gak suka wedang rempah, mereka sangat suka. Nasi Bento juga rasanya sangat enak dan porsinya pas. Yang terakhir ketika b'fast, memang resto tidak terlalu luas, tp hotel menyediakan 2 venue untuk b'fast. Cuma masukan aja buat staff Fnb nya mungkin bisa diatur lagi manning nya karena sempat kehabisan sendok garpu dan refil ny agak lama. But overall ini Hotel rekomended buat yg pengen liburan di Jogja dengan budget ga terlalu mahal, kamar bersih dan lumayan luas untuk ukuran bintang 3.

Terima kasih Pesonna Hotel, next trip pasti kesini ya...
title: Best Experience at Pesonna Hotel Tugu

Pesonna Tugu Hotel sesuai namanya lokasi dekat dengan Tugu Yoga.Kemana2 mudah.

Overall sudah cukup okelah.Semoga kedepannya lebih ditingkatkan lagi

text: Karena satu dan lain hal, dalam last minute menjelang keberangkatan, saya membatalkan penerbangan menuju Kuala Lumpur dan dalam hitungan detik saya merubahnya menjadi Yogyakarta. Kecintaan saya terhadap kota Yogyakarta, menyebabkan kota ini menjadi my second home.                                                                                  Dalam perjalanan menuju Yogyakarta jari jemari saya terus menari mencari tempat bermalam yang menarik perhatian saya di situs travel agent. Saya menemukan sebuah nama yang cukup asing, yang luput dari perhatian saya dalam kunjungan saya sebelum nya. Namanya mencerminkan lokasi hotel tersebut dan keindahan yang ingin diungkapkan : Pesonna Tugu.                                                                                                              Begitu mendarat di lokasi, barulah saya sadar, bahwa cukup sering saya melewati lokasinya, tanpa pernah saya sadari akan dibangun sebuah hotel di tempat itu. Saat menunggu proses check in, dimulailah perjalanan Maret berkesan itu. Di Front Office tersedia beberapa pilihan welcome drink seperti layaknya hotel berkelas lain nya, namun yang membuat saya cukup takjub, hotel ini menyajikannya dengan citarasa sentuhan tradisional nan memikat : pilihan kunyit asam atau temulawak nan segar. Pengaruh budaya lokal diangkat dengan cantik oleh hotel ini.                                                       Saat memasuki ruang kamarnya, masih terasa kesegaran sebagai hotel yang terbilang baru, perabotan, furniture, kamar mandi, kasur, lampu , meja kursi sampai kulkas mini pun terasa menyenangkan. Pengalaman saat membasuh raga pun menjadi lebih berkesan dengan kualitas shower yang nyaris sempurna.                                                            Saat menjelang makan malam, saya ada janji dengan beberapa teman untuk dinding out di suatu restoran di luar hotel. Sambil menikmati dekorasi ruangan yang elegant minimalis saya duduk di sofa Lobby menanti kedatangan taxi yang akan menjemput. Saat itulah...dari arah belakang saya...lamat-lamat ada suara dari beberapa orang yang bernyanyi.... Happy birthday to you... Happy birthday to you.... Saya masih tidak percaya dengan pendengaran saya...dan membantah....pasti itu ada orang lain yang sedang berulang tahun ... Namun tatkala rombongan penyanyi itu masih terus bernyanyi dan berdiri sangat dekat dengan sofa saya, dan hanya saya seorang diri di sofa...  Barulah  saya sadar... Mereka bernyanyi untuk saya.... surprise ... Kaget ... Haru ...malu ...senang (sedikit) semua bercampur menjadi satu.... Beberapa detik saya takjub dan tidak dapat berkata apa-apa... Barulah setelah saya dapat menguasai emosi saya... Saya ikut bernyanyi ... Segeralah berhamburan semua crew Front Office, back Office, resto, bahkan technisian  berdatangan dan berebut menyalami saya... Ada sedikit show time di lobby saat itu, dan menjadi sedikit tontonan menarik bagi tamu-tamu yang datang saat itu. Semua perasaan campur baur ter aduk aduk menjadi satu.                              Sesungguhnya, kali ini kedatangan saya ke Yogyakarta adalah bentuk pelarian diri...sengaja ingin menghindar dari kejaran handai taulan kerabat kenalan. Saya ingin sendiri saja berhari jadi di kota lain. Demikian pula dengan pemilihan hotelnya, saya sengaja menghindar dari beberapa hotel langganan saya di Yogyakarta. Pelarian saya diungkapkan secara istimewa oleh Hotel Pesonna Tugu Yogyakarta. Hari jadi saya bahkan dirayakan oleh orang orang yang baru dan belum saya kenal sebelumnya di tempat yang baru pertama kali saya kunjungi. Ruarrrr biasaaaaa...                                              Keesokan paginya, saat saya membuka hari dengan sarapan di hotel, saya menjadi artis dadakan dan kagetan... Hampir seluruh crew staff jadi mengenal saya dan greeting kepada saya.... Rupanya berita dan foto semalam beredar sangat cepat di intern hotel. Personal Touch yang bagus.                                                                                                                            Saya sangat menikmati pelbagai pilihan makanan yang tersaji. saya sengaja memilih duduk di out door, di samping kolam renang mini. Saya jumpai beberapa menu khas di situ, ada Gudeg, soto, jajan pasar dan egg stall. Takjub juga mendapatkan ada 6 jenis sambal , dan tentu saja roti gandum dan smoked beef n cheese favoritnya saya.                  Finally, saya menambah satu malam lagi di Hotel Pesonna Tugu, di luar schedule yang sudah direncanakan. Really appreciated ... Great attention ... Great Staff ... Good service... sukses selalu untuk Hotel Pesonna Tugu Yogyakarta.
title: Ketahuan deh ...

Ac bagus. Bed, linen bagus. WiFi ada tp jg gak kenceng. Minus: siaran TV dikit. Toilet luas+bersih  Breakfast suka! Ada extra gudeg dll. More than just a budget hotel !

text:
We booked two rooms for 3 nights/4days. We did not get the connection room but our two rooms are side by side side. Upon entering our room we saw the floor was very dirty lots of hair can be seen on the floor, yikes. It looked the floor has not been swept from the previous people staying at the hotel. Also the bathroom was dirty and the floor was sandy.  Seeing that I called the receptionist to report and she quickly sent the housekeeper to clean our room. 
But an hour later while resting in our room I heard something like water dropping on the floor. Apparently the AC has leaked and the water dropped on the floor creating puddle. 
I again called the receptionist and she sent the maintenance guy to fix our AC. 
The next day while sitting at the lobby waiting for the ride to pick us up I felt some drop of water on my shoulder apparently the ac in the lobby is having the same problem with previously problem in our room.  I addressed the problem to the staff near the receptionist which he seemed did not care. 

Breakfast was another things to address as we have to ask the staff because most of the food need to be refilled. We were there at 8-9 am but almost everything is already gone. They need to train the staff to check for the food and to refill once it was empty during the opening hours. The food was so so but one day during our visit they made nasi goreng kampung that nasi goreng was the best nasi goreng we ever tasted but the next day the other nasi goreng served was just blah. 
As we disappointed with the quality of food served at the hotel luckily we found local food stall behind the hotel. They served Chinese food, empek-empek and Mie Ayam their food is way better than the food served at the hotel. 

The highlight of the hotel is their location. From The hotel we are able to walk to the Malioboro street. 
But not again will stay at the hotel unless they improve their cleanest.
title: Dirty place to stay

text: We stayed for 4D3N for a short holiday trip. Upon our arrival, we were greeted by the friendly and courteous staffs which instantly made us feel welcomed. In fact, all hotel staffs that we met share these attributes. The twin-bed rooms that we booked are decent size and have all the basic facilities one would get in all decent hotels. No bathtub, but the bathroom is clean and has nice layout. This is a shariah-compliant hotel, so you can pray mat and surprisingly a "telekung" is also provided. This hotel is located about 1km away from the busy shopping Malioboro street, so you can get to stay in a nice quiet hotel, yet it is within walking distance should you want to shop around. Hotel guests get to enjoy local breakfast spread in nice ambience cafe.
title: Great New Hotel with Courteous and Friendly Staff

text:
Quite new Hotel (12/2016) with very friendly and welcoming staff. 
The Hotel is mostly known to indonesian Tourists, but it is not too busy. 
It may not be located in Yogayas center, but you you can walk to Malioboro in about 20 min. or just take a scooter-taxi (5.000R) or a normal cab (around 15-25.000R). It has a small, nice pool and a fabulous breakfast (fried noodles to fruit - every you want, you ll find there).
Did I mention the staff? They are truly amazing. They do everything to make you feel welcome and comfortable. 
If you need, they ll organize you airport pick up. The rooms are really clean (and new) and there ll be a plate of fresh fruits waiting for you. 
I stayed for 5 nights, and had a very relaxed start to the 3 months I ll stay in Yogyakarta.
title: Very very nice staff

text: Stayed for 2 nights for a business trip. The hotel is relatively new. Service was excellent, staff was very polite and friendly. The room is clean and cozy but a bit dark. Not too good for someone who wants to work inside the room. Location is near the city and there are few local restaurants you're able to walk to. Room Service food was good but the hotel keep having many items sold out. Good variety of food during breakfast. Overall good experience in the hotel but would not recommend for business travellers who likes to continue working in the room at night.

We have booked the hotel from booking.com and I want to manage booking by call the property, guess what, the person (male) rejected my call TWICE after some conversation.

And theen… since I can not manage the booking to add one more day ahead, I have to booked for one day more, unfortunately I forgot to choose “breakfast included”. first day’s breakfast (I booked for 3 days stay), the female employee at FnB told me that my booking did not include the breakfast package. Then I show her the information that if I still want to have a breakfast I have to pay IDR 85.000. She acknowledge that. I also willing to pay.

What happen next is.. when I choose the food and put everything on the table and start to eat, another female employee came to me and TELL ME THE PRICE for additional bfast. Why can she just wait until I finish to have my bfast ? Or she can just ask me when I leave the restaurant ( the desk is just in front of the door and every guest will pass her). 

Really, the manager should teach the employee how to handle the customer in a good way and in a good manner.

Stay only for 1 (one) night for solo-business trip and the experience was great! Easy booking from OTA, fast check-in process (at 10.PM) & got upgrade deluxe room with a panorama view. The hotel was recently re-branding & refurnish. Amenities was great, the bed is firm, comfy pillow & clean sheets. Mini refrigerator, hot & cold shower, prayer mat for Moslem were provided. The staff was very helpful. 
I stay during first day of Ramadan & sahoor meals was provided in the resto area with decent meal but many variety & good choices. Very recommended hotel with great location near Malioboro & major train station. Also i would like to say special thank to FrontManager Ms. Diny & her staff Ms.Vita for their advices & friendly services.

I have checked in first with its name Pesonna Hotel Tugu, while it was actually on its process of rebranding the name into KHAS Tugu Hotel. Then I checked out from kHAS Hotel  ( I feel that I was part of the Pesonna Hotel Tugu's history...LOL).

The service is very excellent. All staffs from every level that I met, from doorman, concierge, receptionist until cleaning services are very nice, helpful and kind.

The F&B is the most i like here. The price is competitive and delicious.  I booked the room exclude breakfast, but I used to eat at the restaurant during my 5 day 4 nights here, either breakfast buffet, alacarte brunch or dinner. Patricia from F&B is also sweet and helpful. 

Definitely I will choose this hotel again if I have another chance to visit Jogja.

text:
The hotel is within walking distance from malioboro which could be considered the heart at downtown yogyakarta where you can find shopping district, market, backpacker hotel etc

The staffs during my visit were friendly and hospitable with certain covid mitigation procedure in place such as (not limited to) hand sanitizer located in various spot in the hotel, body temperature checks and periodical disinfection on frequently touched areas.

Hotel amenities are standard for hotel of its class. Bit of bummer during our stay since the shower isnt working, couldnt switch from the faucet to shower, luckily we booked two connecting room thus could shower on the other room

Hair dryer is available upon request. Breakfast is minimalist but taste decent. Egg station is available but the parking space is rather limited. During the saturday night, parking space was full but we were offered for a free valet service for convenience
title: Hospitable, well located value for money hotel

text: My friend and I stayed in Personna Hotel Tugu for almost 4 days and I would say I can recommend this place. The place is clean, basic toiletries were provided, tv, hot kettle for complimentary tea/coffee aling with bottled water and replenished when you have your room make-up. We had the booking in agoda so there wasn’t any breakfast included but instead tried their buffet on our last day and I must say I was surprised with a wide array of food choices. We dined for dinner on the same restaurant and we were served exceptionally by female guest relations Dias and Afi. They were very pleasant and accommodating to our requests and even had me take home a small amount of their homemade fermented pandan spread. We also bought Pandan chiffon cake from their bakeshop which is moist and tasty. The hotel is more or less 1-2km away from the city center-Malioboro so Grab accessibility is a must. Overall, for the price and service, I am very happy with my stay and the service and would likely to go back again and recommend this to my friends.👍🏼
title: Recommended 👍🏼

text:
Checked-in late at the hotel and welcomed warmly by the staff. Check-in was a breeze and was provided the room at level 7, south east corner. Great unrestricted view of the neighborhood with a wonderful sunrise every morning. Stayed for 8 days and by second day, most of the staff knew me by my name and was personally greeted by each and every staff that passed by. They made the stay very personal and I was enjoying minute of it. I love the room that was provided and without forgetting, the hotel had included cookies on the desk as a surprise gift. 
I had dinner on one of the days and I love the authentic Javanese meal. The portion was a bit large though and I regret not being able to finish to the last bits. 
The breakfast was marvelous. I enjoy the mix of local and foreign cuisine.
When in Yogyakarta, be sure to rent a bike, you will never get enough exploring the wonderful city from the trip to Borobudur to Parangkusumo Beach and up the pine tree mountains. The location of Pesonna Tugu is very strategic and offers great accessibility to every part of Yogyakarta.
The great hospitality is way above what I have ever experienced before and I look forward to staying there soon!
Thanks to all Staff of Pesonna Tugu, especially Ms. Nadia, Mr. Andri, Ms. Maria and Ms. Dias.
And to round up the best experience ever, the Hotel offered to send me to the Airport.
Certainly one of the best experience in my first trip to Yogyakarta!
title: Comfortable Cosy Friendly Hotel

text: Stayed here for two nights on a last minute family trip to Jogja and we enjoyed our stay. The room, although small, it is clean, minimalist, warm and makes you feel at home right.away. Hotel staff are helpful and friendly. The hotel location is  the plus point; 5 minutes away from tourist attraction and very accessable from all directions. If you dont feel like eating hotel cooking, recommended restaurant are just steps away from the hotel. If you are lucky, you can enjoy delicious 'jenang/bubur gudeg' and 'lopis' which just across the hotel. I will be back here on my next trip to Yogjakarta 💚💛
title: Enjoyed our stay..

text:
Bon confort pour ce 3 étoiles moderne près de Tugu, on peut rejoindre à pied Malioboro sans trop de marche, environ 1 km.

Grand batiment récent, les chambres sont agréables et moderne, bonne clim,
grand lit confortable, par contre l'image TV était mauvaise...Petite salle de bain
avec quelques consommables, la vitre séparant la douche est trop courte, 
projetant de l'eau du côté lavabo.

Sinon, petit déjeuner très moyen, peu de plats chaud, surtout asiatiques.

Petite piscine peu agréable jouxtant le restaurant, qui s'apparente plus à
un pataugeoire !
title: Moderne et correct.
